title: Hyperbola Standard Form Equation
text: The standard form for a hyperbola not centered at $$0$$ is $$\frac{x^2}{a^2}-\frac{y^2}{b^2}=1$$

title: Rearrange Coefficients
text: Change the coefficients into fractions so it can be located in the denoinator.

title: Square Denominators
text: Take the sqare root of the coefficinet and place it within a squared exponent.
